original_title: 当我们踢球时我们在谈什么
overview: These are conversations I had with four football partners respectively on the way to the football field，on the way back from the football field，on the way to class，on the way to the bar. The content revolves around freedom，love, meanings of life and so on, which is mainly about their views on the life situation of themselves.
title: WHAT WE TALK ABOUT WHEN WE TALK ABOUT FOOTBALL
